title: Sauteed greens with cannellini beans and pancetta
ingredients: ['1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small red onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 bunch kale, stems removed and roughly chopped', '1 bunch beetroot greens, stems removed and roughly chopped', 'salt to taste', '2 rashers pancetta or streaky bacon, chopped', '1 (400g) tin cannellini beans, drained']
